resource: 1003128.1002622.description=Open door warning buzzer:The open door warning buzzer sounds to alert one or more of the doors is not fully closed (with the vehicle having reached a speed of 3 mph [5 km/h]). 1003128.vtc=true 1003128.description=Open door warning buzzer:The open door warning buzzer sounds to alert one or more of the doors is not fully closed (with the vehicle having reached a speed of 3 mph [5 km/h]). 1003128.source=MANUAL_IMPORT
